Name: Wastewater Infrastructure Pollution Prevention and Environmental Safety Act. (S. 1350/H.R 2964)
Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign, S. 1350/H.R 2964, the Wastewater Infrastructure Pollution Prevention and Environmental Safety Act (WIPPES), requiring the Federal Trade Commission to issue regulations requiring certain products to have “Do Not Flush” labeling
BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts
